question: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
true_answer: Included in the "Great Spa Towns of Europe"
asked_question_translated: Katero novo imenovanje v zvezi z Unescom je mesto Bath prejelo leta 2021?
answer: Mesto Bath je leta 2021 prejelo naziv "Velika zdravili≈°ka mesta Evrope" kot del serije Unescovih kulturnih krajin.
answer_translated_eng: Bath was awarded the title of "Great Spa City of Europe" in 2021 as part of the UNESCO Cultural Landscapes series.
